verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jamani leo ni furaha -
leo leo kwetu
sisi ni furaha, furaha.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Harusi yetu leo tuishangilie,
hongera kwenu, tunawapa heko
Wapenzi wametuita
tuwape heko,
hongera kwenu, tunawapa heko,
(Nazo baraka zake
Mungu ziwe nanyi pia,
maishani mwenu). x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mimi nimekuchagua
uwe wangu wa maisha,
naahidi takupenda
siku zote milele.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mimi kweli nitakupenda
kwa roho yangu yote,
kama vile Yesu
alivyoipenda kanisa.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Angalia vazi langu
lilivyopambwa marembo,
hata ndege wa angani
wanatushangilia.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Mwendo wako wa maringo,
sura yako ya mapenzi,
Mungu baba tujalie
baraka milele.
